item.title: The LAN WAN Connection Made Easy
item.description:
Local area networks (LANs) are standardized and consistent, making them easy to understand and work with. However, connecting to a wide area network (WAN) introduces a new set of telephone company standards that can be challenging for network professionals familiar with LAN technologies. In the past, connecting to a WAN required specialized knowledge of complex technologies like DS channels and SONET multiplexing. This often involved significant effort to bridge the gap between LAN and WAN environments...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-lan-wan-connection-made-easy/
